Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with breast cancer in March this year yhen had mastectomy and lymph node removed, I was lucky, I got out of chemo and radiotherapy, on tamoxifen now, im getting back to normal (whatever that is !!), but dreading it coming back....but we are all fighters and we get through everyday, so lets keep the faith and stay positive, WE WILL WIN xxx Merry Christmas to you all. X
Posts.Title: starting treatment

Posts.Content: Hi Dianne, I found out in April about my breast cancer, It wasn't a shock because in my mind I knew in January (sounds stupid I know, but I know my own body) I had a right mx in May, I'm coping really well, but even though I'm in remission, deep down I know this blimmimg Cancer is hiding in my body somewhere !, although I'm not scared, so I can understand why your feeling this way, just don't let this feeling ruin your life, live and laugh everyday. Hugs to you Chelle x
Posts.Title: living in fear while in remission
